summary: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.
cast: John Abraham|Nargis Fakhri|Raashi Khanna|Prakash Belawadi|Gaurav Sharma|Avijit Dutt|Manoj Bakshi|Sanjay Gurbaxani|Vishnu Govindhan|Aayam Mehta|Malini Sathappan|Dinesh Nair|Kannan Arunachalam|Tarun Bali|Ajay Ratnam|Sudhanva Deshpande|Jayanta Das|Siddartha Basu|Leena Maria Paul|K.R. Parmeshwar|Steve Fahl|Rajeev Rajan|Dibang|Alok Jain|Agnello Dias|Piyush Pandey|Vinod Kumar|Swaroopa Ghosh
title: Madras Cafe
